product_name: Primal Wear Force Bike Jersey - Women's - 2012 Overstock
long_description: Sporting a relaxed fit without elastic at the hem, the women's Primal Wear Force Bike Jersey delivers comfort as well as performance for centuries, mountain-bike tracks or daily commutes. Double-knit polyester fabric wicks away sweat and dries fast. UPF 35 sun protection. No elastic at arm openings or hem frees up mobility and airflow. Full front zipper; 3 rear pockets. Primal Wear Force Bike Jersey for women has a dropped rear hem for full coverage. Overstock.
short_description: Sporting a relaxed fit without elastic at the hem, the women's Primal Wear Force Bike Jersey delivers comfort as well as performance for centuries, mountain-bike tracks or daily commutes.
